posts.title: any title
posts.text: Education Background University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China Doctor degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2023-Now Supervisor: Prof. Yong Li University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China Master degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2021-2023 Supervisor: Associate Prof. Tingjun Li Southwest University Bychelor of engineering, Electronic information engeering, 2017-2021 Supervisor: Associate Prof. Jia Yan Research Interests Wireless radio navigation and radar-related baseband signal processing, Digital Phased Array Signal Processing, Pattern Synthesis, and Waveform Design, High speed Maglev and railway wireless communication, Electronic nose system, Machine learning and Pattern recognization, Optimization theory. Techniques & Skills MATLAB for Algorithm Simulation, statistic processing. Verilog for FPGA Programming and Implementation in Vivado Platform C/C++ for Microprocessors Development (STM32, ESP32, Arduino, etc.) Python for Machine Learning Models Implementations Altium Designer for Circuit Design in System Level Contact me E-mail: yttian2021@std.uestc.edu.cn Last updated on Feb 3, 2024.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
